page.title: 10Caravanning in Carnoustie.
page.content:
There is a caravan site in Carnoustie which lots of people visit.
Most people come because of the sea- side and the beach.There are wardens who look after the toilets.One lady said she comes to the site because the toilets are the best in Scotland. People say that the wardens could not be more helpful than they are.A key is needed for the toilets so that no-one writes on the wall or puts whole toilet rolls down the toilet.
Many people feel as though they are in the country-side,the area is so peaceful and quiet.Walk out of your caravan,through a gate and you are in a park.The park is called Carnoustie House Grounds.
